When everyone is humiliating her, Shaw Jun, who has declared his affection to Xu Nian when they were young, gives her a hand and tries to save her, but she chooses to trust no one because her heart has already been torn apart!

Her heart finally melted by this man. Accepting his help, she comes back gloriously and becomes the fiancée of a financial magnate’s CEO; Encounter ex-husband again, he shows no regret….
